plates.name: BURRITOS
plates.headline: Wrapped with freshness
plates.description: Handmade flour tortillas filled with our vegan basmati rice, Peruvian Mayakoba beans, and your choice of certified Angus beef or premium chicken tenderloin. Served with salsa and guacamole.

plates.name: TORTAS
plates.headline: Mexican-style sandwiches
plates.description: Traditional Mexican sandwiches served on authentic bolillo bread, layered with our Mayakoba beans, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and your choice of protein. Each torta comes with a side of our homemade salsa.

plates.name: PLATES
plates.headline: Complete meals with our premium ingredients
plates.description: Our signature plates feature vegan basmati rice broth, Peruvian Mayakoba beans (never refried), handmade flour tortillas, and your choice of certified Angus beef or fresh chicken tenderloins. Served with all the classic fixings.

plates.name: QUESADILLAS
plates.headline: Melted to perfection
plates.description: Our quesadillas start with mom's handmade flour tortillas, filled with melted cheese and your choice of premium certified Angus beef or chicken tenderloin. Served with house-made salsa and sour cream on the side.

plates.name: SPECIALTIES
plates.headline: Signature dishes of Tacos Fita
plates.description: Chef's special creations that showcase the best of Tacos Fita. These unique dishes feature our premium ingredients in creative combinations that you won't find anywhere else in Portland. Ask your server about our daily specials.
